message: This is a great show of collaboration between multi-agency law enforcement and anti-human trafficking nonprofits. Teams like this disrupt the supply and demand of sex trafficking.

data.description: Get these monsters off our streets, Sheriff Leon Lott said during a press conference for Operation Full Armor.The Richland County Sheriff's Department led a statewide investigation which led to the arrest of 38 people in connection with sex trafficking a
data.title: "Get these monsters off our streets"RCSD lead statewide operation against child predators
